text:
This one was the last straw for me. I’m done with my living room being
rearranged by some, um, company that deems itself owner of said location and
thus changing my drapes, moving my furniture, and otherwise and untoward
eliciting a stream of expletives this morning when logging on to the various
desktop systems we use. 
Why do we tolerate this kind of behaviour? 
We were broken into not long after we moved our business into its current
location. The sense of violation was palpable. 
Why do we not get the same reaction when Microsoft rearranges our shorts? 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
 
E-mail:  
Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 
Web: www.mpecsinc.com
 
Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com
 
Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc
 
Skype: MPECSInc. 
Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls
instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday.
%40MPECSInc.Ca
